0_text:
Welcome to Toasted Classic!
In this game mode, only the original eleven foods
in the traditional evolution path will appear.
No bells or whistles, just an authentic brekky!
1_text:
Oi! Listen up, mate. It's yer first time, right?
Move your mouse cursor and left click to drop a piece.
Don't come cryin' to me if ya misclick!
2_text: Your next piece shows up here.
3_text:
See this?
Press $$hk/hold_piece$$ to hold a piece here
if you find yerself in a jam!
4_text:
This chart over here shows ya
what pieces will combine into next.
This does not apply to real life foods.
5_text:
See that big zero? That's your score.
It will only stay at zero if yer tryin'
really hard to be bad at this.
6_text:
I'll keep your best daily high scores
in this jar of strawberry jam for you.
Your all-time best gets written on the lid.
They won't go to waste, promise!
7_text:
If you want to hear me explain it all again,
go to settings and click 'Reset Tutorial'.
You can always press Escape or Menu to exit the game.
Have fun, mate!
